attributes.action: Allow Muslims to pray at work
attributes.additional_details:
All Muslims have an obligation to perform 5 daily prayers. When our non Muslim colleagues see Muslim that don't pray they discriminate Muslims like myself that pray 5 times a day.

I'm currently working on project with unachieavable targets so they take out frustration on me for praying, which is mandatory. I have even sacrificed my lunch at work and yet they don't care about this.
